option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
filename of the rawacf format file to convert.

synopsis.p: Converts a rawacf format file to raw (dat) format.

description.p: Converts a rawacf format file to raw (dat) format.
The raw format data is written to standard output.

example.description: Convert the file "test.rawacf" to the raw format file "test.dat".
